column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Update 11/8/07:  Came for Free Thursday night and it was great! Free hot drinks
column2: an all-you-can-eat candy buffet with a stunning view of the skyline
column3: and some wonderful special exhibits. I liked the giant aerial photos of water
column5: and lonely people in  Richard Misrach: On the Beach.  The Jasper Johns Gray exhibit was also more interesting than I expected
column6: because the the lack of color made me focus on his techniques and textures.
